Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes a procedure for appointing a president or chairperson upon a vacancy of such position and corrects certain gendered language
Summary: Establishes a procedure for appointing a president or chairperson upon a vacancy of such position; corrects certain gendered language.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, UDC Act; amd ยง10, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act and the economic development law, in relation to establishing a procedure for appointing a president or chairperson upon a vacancy of such position and correcting certain gendered language
